text: eFootball PES 2021 Season Update is a football simulation video game of the eFootball Pro Evolution Soccer series, developed by PES Productions and published by Konami for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Android, Xbox One. It is the 20th installment named with PES and the 25th installment named with Winning Eleven (excluding J.League and semi-annual improved versions) in Japan. It is an updated edition of eFootball PES 2020 (released in September 2019) containing the latest player data and club rosters.Lionel Messi as the cover star of the standard edition, alongside Pro Evolution Soccer ambassadors Cristiano Ronaldo, Alphonso Davies and Marcus Rashford, each representing one of the game's partner clubs. ==Trivia== In 2020 many sports games series by Konami was adding to E at the start of all sports games by Konami such as Pro Evolution Soccer changed the name. ==References== Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:2020 video games Category:PlayStation 4 games
title: EFootball PES 2021 Season Update
